headline: Dr Pepper used a TikTok creator’s jingle. Now everyone wants to get in on the act
summary: TikTok creator Romeo Bingham made up a new jingle for Dr Pepper that was so catchy, the soda company used it in a TV ad. Now, other TikTokers are flooding the app with their own ditties in hopes of the same thing happening to them.

headline: Gen Z Rejects 'Radioactive' Diet Sodas for Zero Sugar Ones
summary: Instead, the blind taste-test showdown last year pitted Pepsi Zero Sugar against Coca-Cola Zero Sugar.  At the Super Bowl next month, it’s Zero Sugar that will star in the beverage company’s Pepsi commercial, not the original formula.  “We’ve gone all in” on Pepsi Zero Sugar in the last two years, said Ram Krishnan, the chief executive officer of PepsiCo North America, so much so that the vast majority of its Pepsi marketing budget is spent promoting Zero Sugar.
